description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists In Schneider Electric's 66074 MGE Network Management Card Transverse installed in MGE UPS and MGE STS. The integrated web server (Port 80/443/TCP) of the affected devices could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive device information if network access was obtained.

product.name: 66074 MGE Network Management Card Transverse installed in MGE UPS and MGE STS

enisaIdProduct.product_version: MGE Network Management Card Transverse, part number: SF66074. All card versions affected, when installed in following products: MGE Galaxy 5000, MGE Galaxy 6000, MGE Galaxy 9000, MGE EPS 7000, MGE EPS 8000, MGE EPS 6000, MGE Comet UPS, MGE Galaxy PW, MGE Galaxy 3000, MGE Galaxy 4000
